Webjeda Gatok

About

Webjeda Gatok is a Bootstrap based theme. Any Bootstrap element can be used in the theme.

The name Gatok is a short form of Ghatotkacha who was a monster in the Hindu mythology Mahabharatha.

He is someone you shouldnâ€™t be messing with!
